他們一週前剛搬到這個新地點。

實際上是一個更好、更方便的地方。

這是與朋友聚會的好地方。氣氛很輕鬆而且不太吵鬧。所有的調酒師都非常友好和樂於助人。他們的雞尾酒非常棒，非常創新且美味。

價格也非常合理。

一定會回來的。

They just moved to this new place a week ago.

It is actually a better and more convenient place.

This is a good place to meet with friends.The atmosphere is easy and not too noisy.All bartenders are very friendly and helpful.Their cocktails are great, very innovative and delicious.

The price is also very reasonable.

Will definitely come back.
